text:
The version 18 of the fop does render the external-graphic tag..It hangs after 
the message "writing out pdf"...the syntax in the formatting file is attached 
with..please correct the syntax if there is a problem with syntax.. 

xml file is


<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE DocRoot 
         [
          <!ELEMENT DocRoot (Music|Electronics|Flowers)*>
          
          <!ELEMENT Music (Name,CoverPic,Prize,Singer,Description)>
          <!ELEMENT Electronics (Name,CoverPic,Prize,Company,Description)>
          <!ELEMENT Flowers (Name,CoverPic,Prize,Description)>
          <!ELEMENT Name (#PCDATA)>
          <!ELEMENT CoverPic (#PCDATA)>
               <!ATTLIST CoverPic
                         location CDATA #REQUIRED >
          <!ELEMENT Prize (#PCDATA)>
          <!ELEMENT Singer (#PCDATA)>
          <!ELEMENT Company (#PCDATA)>
          <!ELEMENT Description (#PCDATA)>
                    
         ]>          

<DocRoot>
 <Music>
       <Name>Summer of 69</Name>
       <CoverPic location="www.yahoo.com">Bryan Adams</CoverPic>
       <Prize>2.0$</Prize>
       <Singer>Brayn Adams</Singer>
       <Description>All Times Hit</Description>
 </Music>
</DocRoot>


xsl stylesheet is


<?xml version="1.0"?>
<xsl:stylesheet version="1.0" xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform"
                              xmlns:fo="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Format" >
<xsl:output indent="yes"/>

<xsl:template match="/">
 
       <fo:root xmlns:fo="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Format">
   
        <fo:layout-master-set>
           <fo:simple-page-master master-name="A4" 
                                  margin-top="1.0in"
                                  margin-bottom="1.0in"
                                  margin-right="1.0in"
                                  margin-left="1.0in">
            <fo:region-start  extent="3.0in"/>
		    <fo:region-before extent="3.0in"/>
		    <fo:region-body  margin="2.0in"/>
		    <fo:region-end   extent="3.0in"/>
            <fo:region-after  extent="3.0in"/>
           </fo:simple-page-master>
        </fo:layout-master-set>
       
       <fo:page-sequence master-name="A4">
            <fo:static-content flow-name="xsl-region-before">
              
              <fo:block>
             <fo:external-graphic src="http://160.110.150.253:5555/hand.gif" /> 
              The Periodic Table</fo:block>
              
            </fo:static-content>
        
            <fo:flow flow-name="xsl-region-body">
                <fo:table>
                    <fo:table-column  column-width="150pt"/>
                    <fo:table-column  column-width="125pt"/>
                <fo:table-body>
                <xsl:apply-templates select="//Music"/>
                </fo:table-body>
                </fo:table>
            </fo:flow>
            
            
       </fo:page-sequence>
       
       </fo:root>
       
 </xsl:template>                                                             
 
 <xsl:template match="Music">
     <fo:table-row>
     <fo:table-cell>  
     <fo:block font-size="8pt" font-family="serif" line-height="20pt">
     <xsl:value-of select="Name"/>
     </fo:block>  
     </fo:table-cell>
     
     <fo:table-cell>  
     <fo:block font-size="10pt" font-family="serif" line-height="20pt">
     <xsl:value-of select="Prize"/>
     </fo:block>  
     </fo:table-cell>
      
      </fo:table-row>
    
      <fo:table-row>
      
     <fo:table-cell>  
     <fo:block font-size="12pt" font-family="serif" line-height="20pt">
       <xsl:value-of select="Singer"/>
     </fo:block>  
     </fo:table-cell>
     
     <fo:table-cell>  
     <fo:block font-size="10pt" font-family="serif" line-height="20pt">
     Only works for table of contents without any problems. The case where the 
page number doesn't fit on a line isn't handled, and any text on the same line 
and after the page-number might not appear exactly where you want it to. 
     </fo:block>  
     </fo:table-cell>
     
     </fo:table-row>
 </xsl:template>    
 
 
 </xsl:stylesheet>
       
       
formatted output is 

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<fo:root xmlns:fo="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Format">
<fo:layout-master-set>
<fo:simple-page-master margin-left="1.0in" margin-right="1.0in" margin-
bottom="1.0in" margin-top="1.0in" master-name="A4">
<fo:region-start extent="3.0in"/>
<fo:region-before extent="3.0in"/>
<fo:region-body margin="2.0in"/>
<fo:region-end extent="3.0in"/>
<fo:region-after extent="3.0in"/>
</fo:simple-page-master>
</fo:layout-master-set>
<fo:page-sequence master-name="A4">
<fo:static-content flow-name="xsl-region-before">
<fo:block>
<fo:external-graphic src="http://ibiblio.org/xml/images/atom.jpg"/> 
              The Periodic Table</fo:block>
</fo:static-content>
<fo:flow flow-name="xsl-region-body">
<fo:table>
<fo:table-column column-width="150pt"/>
<fo:table-column column-width="125pt"/>
<fo:table-body>
<fo:table-row>
<fo:table-cell>
<fo:block line-height="20pt" font-family="serif" font-size="8pt">Summer of 
69</fo:block>
</fo:table-cell>
<fo:table-cell>
<fo:block line-height="20pt" font-family="serif" font-size="10pt">2.0
$</fo:block>
</fo:table-cell>
</fo:table-row>
<fo:table-row>
<fo:table-cell>
<fo:block line-height="20pt" font-family="serif" font-size="12pt">Brayn 
Adams</fo:block>
</fo:table-cell>
<fo:table-cell>
<fo:block line-height="20pt" font-family="serif" font-size="10pt">
     Only works for table of contents without any problems. The case where the 
page number doesn't fit on a line isn't handled, and any text on the same line 
and after the page-number might not appear exactly where you want it to. 
     </fo:block>
</fo:table-cell>
</fo:table-row>
</fo:table-body>
</fo:table>
</fo:flow>
</fo:page-sequence>
</fo:root>
creator: sunil.gaba@blr.hpsglobal.com

text: batch transition pre-FOP1.0 resolved+fixed bugs to closed+fixed
creator: gadams@apache.org
